snippet: General Motors says the new technology deploys the air bag more efficiently, while providing crash protection that is equivalent to, or better than, more expensive and complex dual-stage air bags, depending upon the type of crash.
abstract: General Motors says the new technology deploys the air bag more efficiently, while providing crash protection that is equivalent to, or better than, more expensive and complex dual-stage air bags, depending upon the type of crash.

headline.main: 2013 Chevrolet Cruze Uses New Air Bag Technology
